General.Name: Hana Financial
General.Description: Hana Financial Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides financial services in South Korea, Hong Kong, Singapore, the United States, Japan, China, Indonesia, the United Kingdom, Canada, and internationally. The company offers deposit services; household, business, auto leasing, credit, equity-backed, and housing loans, as well as loans to non-auto sectors, such as IT, medical equipment, and construction machines. Further, it provides insurance products and solutions, including vehicle insurance, general insurance, and long-term health insurance; life insurance and bancassurance services; credit/debit card issuance and settlement services; foreign-exchange services; and securities trading, brokerage, and underwriting services. In addition, the company provides real estate investment trust and special asset investment trust services; corporate financial restructuring services; electronic document certification, life and financial consulting, and mobile money transfer services; transfer agency services; and financial IT and system integration services. It also engages in asset management, sea food processing, and real estate management activities, as well as invests in business startups. Hana Financial Group Inc. was founded in 1971 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
